message.body: Hey, how do you want the cake? Can do each tier a different flavor (choc, yellow, choc... or yellow, choc, yellow)? Each tier half and half? Or marble?
Can u do each tier a different flavor. Id say two chocolate one vanilla
And a third color to break up the blue and white?
If u can silver. Her decorations have silver and Black in them
Yea I can do that... last question, lol.. any specific kind of decoration or design?

No special decoration or character but u can make it pretty since it's her 16th maybe a little sparkly or something. Just let me know the time to pick up in fri and I'll be there and the price. Thank u
Ok cool. .. once I have the freedom planned out I can price it up for you
